plot: An old lady comes across a group of shadowy figures and a giant whale that wouldn't leave her alone. Little did she know they are important pieces of her memories that she lost.
title: Fishing at Lethe
plot_es: An old lady comes across a group of shadowy figures and a giant whale that wouldn't leave her alone. Little did she know they are important pieces of her memories that she lost.
plot_en: An old lady comes across a group of shadowy figures and a giant whale that wouldn't leave her alone. Little did she know they are important pieces of her memories that she lost.
